channel.title: SevenAtSevenSection1
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenSection1, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Hurricane Melissa leaves Jamaica devastated. And, the shutdown's impact on airports
item.description: Officials are assessing the damage after Hurricane Melissa made landfall in Jamaica as a Category 5. And, how the government shutdown is impacting air...

item.title: Trump says he's confident of a deal ahead of Xi meeting
item.description: President Trump has confidently predicted striking a deal with China's leader, who he's set to meet Thursday.

item.title: Camouflaging cars and swapping license plates: How agents make immigration arrests
item.description: Immigration enforcement officers are sometimes forgoing license plates or otherwise masking their cars while apprehending migrants across the U.S.

item.title: This furloughed IRS lawyer is living out his dream of being a hot dog vendor
item.description: While on furlough, Isaac Stein is fulfilling a childhood dream and passion project as a hot dog vendor.

item.title: An Alzheimer's pill appears to protect some in a high-risk population
item.description: A new study is reviving hope that a twice-daily pill can slow down Alzheimer's in people whose genes put them at high risk for the disease.

item.title: Here are the 5 Startup Battlefield finalists at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025
item.description: After two days full of live demos and pitches, it's time to announce the five finalists at this year's Startup Battlefield.

item.title: LG Uplus is latest South Korean telco to confirm cybersecurity incident
item.description: Korean telecom giant LG Uplus is the third major phone provider in the past six months to report a cybersecurity incident.

item.title: CEO of spyware maker Memento Labs confirms one of its government customers was caught using its malware

item.title: Federal trial to start over Trump’s efforts to deploy the National Guard in Portland, Oregon
item.description: A federal trial over whether President Donald Trump can deploy the National Guard to Portland, Oregon, is set to begin Wednesday.

item.title: Flipkart’s Super.money teams up with Kotak811 to make India’s free UPI payments pay
item.description: The partnership aims to issue about 2 million fixed-deposit-backed credit cards in the next 12 months.
